attributes.action: ensure that diesel prices are fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Diesel historically was always cheaper than petrol not any more 
 Not only is it the life blood of the farming and transportation industry yet when fuel prices began to rise Diesel became more expensive that petrol 
And even though petrol prices are at last falling diesel still costs more that petrol 

This has to be addressed by the PM

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
